name: 林鈞陶
objective:
本課程探討無線通訊系統基頻演算法設計，主要包含多輸入多輸出傳輸系統中接收端與傳送端之聯合最佳化問題。
課程綱要:
1. 基本矩陣運算
2. 多輸入多輸出接收機設計
3. 多輸入多輸出天線選擇
4. 多輸入多輸出前置編碼器設計
This course aims at the baseband algorithm design for wireless communication systems. Much attention will be focused on the joint multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) transceiver optimization.
Course outline:
1.Basic matrix operations.
2.MIMO receiver design.
3.MIMO antenna selection.
4.MIMO precoder design.
